Thanks to @Feminists4Life @prolifedem @LifeMattersJrnl for the story on pro-life feminism at the March for Life! https://t.co/oezpYuw62L
Pro-Life Feminists Broader Message Is Nonviolence via @RealClearNews Was an interesting one to write. https://t.co/oezpYuw62L
@JettCallie Hey, just tried to give you a call! Just let me know whenever you're free. Thanks!
@JettCallie perfect, thanks! Will give you a call then. Will be from a 404 area code.
@JettCallie Great, thanks so much! I'm at the expo right now, but if it'd be easier we could just talk over the phone this afternoon? 4ish?

I mean but it can't be real. Can it? NOTHING IS REAL ANYMORE. WE ALL LIVE IN AN ALTERNATE REALITY. #GoldenShowers
We're living in The Upside Down. #GoldenShowers https://t.co/aekYkkwVww
Cue the waterworks when he said, "Michelle..." #ObamaFarewell
Snapping emphatically by myself to Obama's farewell address... there are no words to discribe how much I'll miss this man. #obamafarewell
Sessions' law enforcement talk is a bunch of barely coded bullshit.
@vonna_husby I know you're replying to everyone who tweeted @ Trump, but you do realize you already responded to this one, right?
The percentage of @realDonaldTrump's tweets about Meryl Streep will be in direct correlation with the number of intel briefings he has tmr
I just came back on here to see if @realDonaldTrump had tweeted about Meryl Streep yet. You know the tweets are coming... #GoldenGlobes
Little to no representation of Latinx folks at the #GoldenGlobes, of course. The best we get is Sofia Vergara pretending to botch her lines.

@jdsenglishteach But seriously what to do if he wins? I need solace. And alcohol. But I can't have the latter because I'm working until 3 am

@jdsenglishteach This is true. Gives me some hope. Just feeling very, very nervous.
